turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Today I need your assistance in ordering a couple pizzas from Bella Luna. Actually a few, maybe four pizzas and they're all small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and I'm looking to get extra cheese on all of those and I'm looking to get on all those I'd like to get banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas: banana peppers and anchovies with extra cheese, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I'll be ready to pick them up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Take it easy, bye-bye. Thank you.
